devdoc.author: AI Marketplace Team
devdoc.details: Core contract for listing products in the AI-powered marketplace

getBatchProducts(uint256[]).details: Batch get products (for efficient AI processing)

getProductForAI(uint256).details: Get product details for AI processing

getProductsByCategory(string).details: Get all products by category (for AI recommendations)

getSellerReputation(address).details: Get seller reputation for AI processing

purchaseProduct(uint256,address).details: Purchase a product (called by escrow contract)

updateProductRating(uint256,uint256,uint.details: Update product rating (called by reputation system)
